caption.p: Differentially expressed genes (DEGs) in CEF cells infected with H7N9 virus. ( A) Principal component analysis of the gene expression changes at 2 and 10 hours post-infection (hpi) ( B) Number of up- and down-regulated genes in untreated and ultra-violet (UV)-treated virus infections. ( C) Pairwise analysis of the DEGs at 10 hpi showing (i) up- and (ii) down-regulated genes in untreated and UV-treated virus infections. ( D) Functional annotation of up-regulated DEGs. ( E) Functional annotation of down-regulated DEGs.
